basics.name: Ezra Lin | 林季陽
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the National Central University. Feel comfort to contact to me.

work.summary: Designed and developed a brand-new feature code for register key generated and validated.Learned the facial detected and identified knowledge.Collaborate with peers to develop new features.

work.company: Applications Developing Dept. in Lianhwa Foods Corporation
work.summary: Responsible for developing about financial affairs system, factory management system, and processes as per the requirement for affairs within the company.-Collaborated with other developers on designing, developing, testing, and implementing new JSP pages, HTML pages, some full- stack websites with Liferay MVC framework, databases and Servlets.-Assisted with peers in the improvement of software and performed error analysis.-Maintained company website and using own knowledge and experience resolved any problematic issues.-Participated in weekly team meetings with managers; provided drafts and reports on progress of the projects.
